text: Calycosiphonia macrochlamys is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in Cameroon, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, and Ghana. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== macrochlamys Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Flora of Ghana Category:Flora of Cameroon Category:Flora of Equatorial Guinea Category:Flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Calycosiphonia macrochlamys
